channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 2026 Olympics: How to watch the Winter Games Closing Ceremony today
item.description:
The Closing Ceremony for the 2026 Winter Games is this Sunday. (Li Jing/Xinhua via Getty Images)
Xinhua News Agency via Getty Images
The 2026 Winter Olympics come to an end this weekend. This year's Closing Ceremony theme is "Beauty in Action." The event will feature appearances from musician and DJ Gabry Ponte, actress Benedetta Porcaroli, and ballet dancer Roberto Bolle. Alfredo Accatino, the ceremony's artistic director, has promised the ceremony will "begin with lots of colors and end with a party." The ceremony will kick off today at 2:30PM ET on NBC and Peacock. An encore br...

item.title: My Moleskine wasn’t enough to save my mental health but this app was
item.description: Homescreen Heroes: Life Note is a journaling app that puts history’s greatest minds in your pocket.

item.title: Comment débuter en impression 3D ? Nos conseils et nos astuces
item.description: Si vous débutez dans l'impression 3D, il se peut que vous fassiez face à une multitude de questions. Ce guide complet vous accompagnera pas à pas dans votre découverte de cette technologie fascinante.

item.title: Apple is reportedly considering red as the next premium color for its iPhones
item.description: First, we got iPhones in Hermès orange, and now we might get them in Louboutin red. According to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, Apple is already mulling over what the next premium colorway will be for its iPhone Pro models. While we're not expecting iPhone 18 announcements until later this year, Gurman reported that "red is the new flagship color in testing for the next iPhone Pros." Gurman added that there were rumors of purple and brown shades, but predicted that these could just be different shades of the main red option. Red is definitely a departure from Apple's usual palette of more modest ton...

item.title: OpenAI's first ChatGPT gadget could turn out to be a smart speaker with a camera attached
item.description: We have a few more leaked details on the ChatGPT gadget that is apparently in the OpenAI pipeline.

item.title: Amazon fait perdre 100 € à ce balai aspirateur noté 8/10, qui aspire toutes les saletés et ne laisse aucune trace
item.description: Le Tineco Floor One S7 Stretch Steam est un balai aspirateur complet qui bénéficie d'une bonne autonomie pour faire briller votre domicile en un seul passage. Chez Amazon, il bénéficie d'une remise de 100 euros pour tomber à 599 euros.

item.title: La sélection des meilleurs smartphones à grand écran en 2026
item.description: D'année en année, les smartphones ne cessent de grandir. Vous êtes adeptes des grands écrans ? Que ce soit pour jouer, regarder des vidéos ou juste pour un plus grand confort, nous avons sélectionné pour vous les meilleurs téléphones avec un grand écran.

item.title: Quantonation’s double-sized second fund shows quantum still has believers
item.description: Quantonation Ventures, a venture firm investing in quantum and physics-based startups, has closed its oversubscribed second fund at €220 million, or approximately $260 million. That’s more than twice the size of its inaugural fund, and comes in addition to other signals that the quantum winter isn’t coming yet.

item.title: Test du Minisforum AI X1 Pro-470 : ils veulent la peau du Mac mini
item.description: Minisforum veut la peau du Mac mini avec ce X1 Pro. Alimentation intégrée, connectique très riche et puce AMD survitaminée. Mais voici pourquoi ce petit PC de 2026 va vous diviser.

item.title: Apple's first event of the year will reportedly bring at least five products over a 'three-day blitz'
item.description: Ready your wallets if you've been thinking about upgrading your Apple products. According to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, Apple will announce "at least five products," starting on Monday, March 2, and extending to its scheduled "experience" on Wednesday, March 4. There's a long list of potential options that Apple could announce next month, but Gurman is confident in a few. According to the report, Apple is "very likely" to reveal the low-cost MacBook, especially considering the event logo's choice of colors that could reference the new laptop colors. Gurman also predicted that Apple could announc...

item.title: Trump says Netflix will face ‘consequences’ if it doesn’t fire board member Susan Rice
item.description: Netflix board member Susan Rice had predicted that corporations that “take a knee” to Trump will be “held accountable” when Democrats return to power.

item.title: I can't go to the Six Nations this year, but this $2.50 per month solution means I'll be watching on the go
item.description: It's cheaper than ever to ensure you don't miss out on all the action
